sense.name: freedom
sense.commentary: INDEPENDENCE[+event] independency - freedom from control or influence of another or other
sense.examples: Her financial independence was difficult to maintain. When George wanted to assert his independence stayed up way past bedtime. George's independence lasted only one night.

sense.name: end of the American Revolution
sense.commentary: INDEPENDENCE[+event] the successful ending of the American Revolution
sense.examples: They maintained close relations with England even after independence.

sense.name: city in Missouri
sense.examples: The beginning of the Santa Fe Trail is in Independence, Missouri.
